get.description: Response contains a list of package IDs that start with the specified query string.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Package query string.  Note: no results will be returned unless this contains at least 2 characters

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Specifies an offset to facilitate paging

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of packages to return.  Must be between 1 and 100.

parameters.name: packageId
parameters.description: query.

get.description: Response contains a list of package IDs that start with the specified query string.

parameters.name: packageId
parameters.description: query.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Specifies an offset to facilitate paging

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of versions to return.  Must be between 1 and 100.

get.description: Resolves a dependecy tree using the most current published dependencies

parameters.name: packageId
parameters.description: Package ID (not including a version or semver range)

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: Version number (not a semver range)

parameters.name: ts
parameters.description: UTC timestamp (ms) at which the dependency tree will be resolved.

get.description: Gets the difference between the dependency trees of two versions, or versions at different points in time.

parameters.name: packageId
parameters.description: Package ID (not including a version or semver range)

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: Version number (not a semver range) for the left-hand side (LHS) of the comparison

parameters.name: ts
parameters.description: UTC timestamp (ms) at which the LHS dependency tree will be resolved.  Defaults to the current time

parameters.name: rhsversion
parameters.description: Version number (not a semver range) for the right-hand side (RHS) of the comparison.  Defaults to the LHS version.

parameters.name: rhsts
parameters.description: UTC timestamp (ms) at which the RHS dependency tree will be resolved.  Defaults to the current time.

get.description: Gets a list of history entries that show how a packages sub-dependencies have changed over time.  If no optional parameters are supplied, the most recent results are returned.  Results are always sorted in descending order.

parameters.name: packageId
parameters.description: Package ID (not including a version or semver range)

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: Version number (not a semver range)

parameters.name: ending
parameters.description: UTC timestamp (ms) of the last history entry to return.  This in an inclusive limit and does not affect sort order.  If this value is present, the 'after' parameter will be ignored if present.

parameters.name: after
parameters.description: UTC timestamp (ms) of a point in time after which history entries will be returned.  This in an exclusive limit and does not affect sort order.  This value will be ignored if the 'ending' parameter is present.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of history entries to return.  Must be between 1 and 100.
